solution_line_template: The burger meal is ${burger_meal_cost} and to upsize the meal is ${upsize_cost} so {burger_meal_cost}+{upsize_cost} = $<<{burger_meal_cost}+{upsize_cost}={daily_lunch_cost}>>{daily_lunch_cost}
He spends ${daily_lunch_cost} on lunch and after {num_days} days he spends {daily_lunch_cost}*{num_days} = $<<{daily_lunch_cost}*{num_days}={total_cost}>>{total_cost}
